name: deterioration (the_sem, Gyliph)
description:
Rules are never fun!! Parents suck! Skool is for nerdz!

Come play our game where the rules get removed as you play!

LESS RULES IS MORE FUN

Move with WASD


Made for Blackthornprod game jam #3

Theme: Less is more

Art by Gyliph

Music by Sem

cricket sounds, door unlock

Everything else by both  cute boys big burly men

This is our first game we've ever made! Feedback appreciated!!
